channel.title: How To Score Some Extra Minutes Before/During School
channel.description:
This is my first tut so be nice ;) i think some remade versions of this has been posted but who the heck cares eh?
Heres what you will require .. Just Some Magnets , preferably big ones (or alot of small ones)
This works on bells that have a hammer that hits the outer shell when it rings.
Throw a magnet or 2 depending on how big they are. When the magnets are stuck on the outside of the bell, it will dull the sound of the bell so you can hear a slight clinging sound.
I have tried this several times and it worked. Me and some friends were experimenting with this and created this.
[font=Verdana]Disclaimer[/font]
I am not responsible for any outcomes/consequences you may face during this prank.

item.title: How To Score Some Extra Minutes Before/During School
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

On another topic

Better yet, write on a wall saying your gunna blow up the school and you’ll be off for a few days at least

They don’t do that for us… They just lock us in school…
My school is retarded lol, They want us all to die.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Score Some Extra Minutes Before/During School
